name: Quetzalcoatl - The Aztec Ride
description:
Rate us for Ludum Dare!

ALL ABOARD!

Keep the roller coaster alive by giving your Aztec community a nice thrill, but be careful not to lose them! If you run low on fuel, just get some people flying and catch them on their way down. Hail Quetzalcoatl!

---------------------------------------------------

Controls

    [←][→] - accelerate/decelerate.
    [R] - restart level.
    You lose when you run out of fuel (on the left).
    Get more fuel by catching flying passengers.

---------------------------------------------------

The Team

    Omer Zadok: Programming
    Idan Rooze: Art
    Chase Bethea: Music and SFX
    Ori Brusilovsky: Additional programming
